meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark McDermott Mina Wender Joe Ornstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #983.

td.p: Mark McDermott, an editorial writer originally from Iowa
Mina Wender, a teacher from Baltimore, Maryland
Joe Ornstein, a proofreader from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,000)

tr.td: CLASSICAL MUSIC
GARDENING
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
GUINNESS SPORTS RECORDS
"DAY"s
KNIGHTS
